name: google-voice
description: An (unofficial) native MacOS App for Google Voice.

scripts.installsupport: echo 'Run: [brew install graphicsmagick imagemagick] for additional DMG support.'
scripts.dist: npm run build && mkdir -p dist/ && ./node_modules/.bin/create-dmg ./build/Google Voice-darwin-x64/Google Voice.app --overwrite --dmg-title=Google Voice --identity='Aubrey Portwood' ./dist

author: Aubrey Portwood
